text: the important part for us to recognize
is depression is different than

all the time boy it's hot and I'm very

what it sounds like adults are more

so that the number one set of

have a very very big bottle it has to
full the shelf and has to hit you in the

so that we have patients who when
they're impulsively upset and take a

when this medicine came out on the

re-uptake inhibitor so if you ate pure

your system before getting to the brain
when you take Prozac it takes several
weeks to work it eventually gets to the

is it's stopping your serotonin that

eliminated too quickly
